definitions: Placing something over or on top of something else, so as to protect or conceal it.
Dealing with or including a particular subject or area.
Providing enough money to pay for something.
Acting as a substitute for someone.
examples: She is covering the cake with frosting.
The report is covering all aspects of the issue.
They are covering a lot of ground today.
The insurance is covering the damages.
He is covering for his colleague.
